name: Nanako in classic Japanese Monster Castle
overview:
In this game you play once again Nanako . The game consists of 25 levels, each one representing a plant of the tower Heún . To reach the next level you must literally build a path to exit the top of the screen. This is achieved thanks to ability Nanako's to carry wooden boxes and leave them somewhere else, just one at a time.

On each screen there will be a Karakasa that will sometimes make life impossible for us. With care, Nanako can walk on the Karakasa , although if by chance the Karakasa moved from the site causing to fall there Nanako would be a good chance that we would lose one of our five precious lives. able to use the Being Karakasa as a support to jump and reach higher levels is key in some levels.

The game is handled with the keyboard, which is totally redefinable. By default, the keys are as follows:

CURSOR LEFT. LEFT
RIGHT CURSOR. RIGHT
CURSOR ABA. GET BOX
CURSOR ARR. DROP BOX
SPACE JUMP
